parameters: It's locked. The guy upstairs said I might be able to get the key
from one of their members who's staying in room 201 at the Motel 69.
Hey girl, I am. Care to sell your soul?
In this economy? I think not. What else you got?
I'll give you the weapon needed to crush your enemies if you give me 49%
Now that you sold your soul to Satan for a Hell of a lot of luck, you
can break open pots and barrows.
Be mindful, because each punch you give you lose a point of Mojo. Run
out of Mojo and you're not breaking shit!
You're all out of swagger, playa! Make sure you keep that gauge
up by visiting the Kum & Leave!
